author: vsiveton
msg: MPIR-130: No mark or link to SNAPSHOT artifacts in Dependency Repository Locations section of Dependencies report
o verify if artifact baseVersion equals or not artifact version
o take care if artifact type is not a pom to prevent warn message from DefaultMavenProjectBuilder

author: jukka
msg: JCR-1663: REFERENCE properties produce duplicate strings in memory
Use cached flyweight Name instances to avoid many copies of the same names taking up too much memory. Passes all tests and reportedly decreases memory usage.
Since my proposed patch: Added improvements suggested by Thomas (thanks!) and moved the cache functionality to a separate class to increase separation of concerns.
